string: Generate ES cell-derived neural precursors from the human ES cell line H9 as previously described<sup>6</sup> with the single modification that HNM was replaced with NBI \(IMDM:F12 1:1, 1xN2, 1xB27-Vitamin A, Insulin to 25ug/ml and Pen/Strep).
refer: The phrase "as previously described" refers to the method of generating ES cell-derived neural precursors from the human ES cell line H9.
